name: Rogue Ninja
overview: If you like your games to be a constant challenge while having to deal with an ever increasing amount of Ninja's on a single level, then read on, as Rogue Ninja will have your adrenaline pumping for that top high score. In this game you as the dark blue Ninja must traverse each platform to deal with other colored Ninjas that are not only attacking you from all sides, but they each act differently and may take more than a few stars to deal with which becoming an ever increasing threat as the single level progresses. Thankfully if you're quick and don't get touched, you can continue on, replenish your stars via the appearing treasure chest.
